header_text: You have been in the same post for five years, and you are beginning to feel bored and unchallenged in your job. You would like to try for a new position, but you worry if you will be competitive on the job market. Thinking about your career trajectory, you believe your chances of finding a new job that you find fulfilling are likely.

buttons: You will probably be stuck in a job you don't enjoy.
You stand a good chance of landing a rewarding position.
